Night Shift shrugs with a soft sigh.

"Okay okay, I'll go see what I can do=
 there. Man, someone got up on the wrong side of the recover berth this mor=
n'n.."

He heads into the base, to report to Lord Perseus.  He finds his wa=
y toward Rat Trap and Quickstride as they re aquaint themselves with Depthc=
harge.  Before he enters, he had completely forgotten to switch his faction=
 symbol back to Autobot from Decepticon from his last mission.  Quickstride=
 gasps, turns around and aims his cannon at him.

"FREEZE!  WEAPONS DOWN NO=
W!"

Night Shift jumps and puts his hands right up.

" Woahh, woah, it's co=
ol it's cool.. I'm on your side.."

He now realizes what's going on.

"Slag=
, no wonder.. Forgot ta change this back.  Sorry about that."

He switches =
his insignia back to his valid faction symbol.

Rat Trap nodds.

" Ohhhh, y=
ou're one of those...  So how'dwe know you're on our side for real huh?"

Q=
uick stride snorts.

" Yeah, how do we know?  For all we know you could be =
one heck of an actor."

Night Shift knew his status would be a little suspi=
cious.  He puts his weapons down as asked.

" I promise, no charades guys. =
 I'm definitely an Autobot."

Rat Trap scowls.

"Prove it.  What's the one =
phrase that brought the Matrix of Leadership ta life when Rodimus Prime was=
 handed it?"

Night Shift smiles.

"I know that.  Light our darkest hour."
=

Rat Trap sighs.

"Whew, yup, he's legit. Ya sure had me gon' there for a m=
oment."

Night Shift salutes Depthcharge.

"Sorry for the alarm sir.  I gue=
ss I forgot ta switch my badge back after my last mission...  Which reminds=
 me..  Sounds like you guys could use a good pair of wheels.  I'm available=
 twenty four seven if ya need me."

Rat Trap thinks for a moment.

"You sur=
e look like Tucson..."

Night Shift kneels down to Rat Trap.

" That happen=
s ta be my best buddy.  How is he?  Is he still online?"

Rat Trap nodds.

=
"Yeah, he is, but when I last left 'em he was in pretty rough shape. He's b=
ack at the Ark."

Night Shift now feels a string of guilt come over him.

"=
Slag.  I knew I shouldn'tve left 'em."

Rat Trap catches onto him and puts =
a hand on Night Shift's arm.

" No Decepticon would ever show an ounce of g=
uilt for a comrade.  You'n wheels are kinda alike. Oh, yeah, that's the nic=
kname I gave 'em.  He's back at the Ark, helpn' Lord Elder ta recover Rodim=
us Prime'n a few other key comrades of his."

Night Shift's optics widen.

=
"Woah, what happened ta Rodimus and the gang?"

Quickstride chimes in.

" A=
pparently Rodimus, Nightlight and another Autobot got abducted by Lord Hydr=
a's merry men. When Tucson tried ta go rescue them he failed, got in pretty=
 rough shape too.  Rodimus got corrupted by a shell program that Perceptor =
put over 'em.. Yeah, real messy situation gon' on there..."

Night Shift's =
optics narrow.

"I knew I could feel somethn' fishy gon' on...  Well, I was=
 gonna go ta Lord Perseus but I got a feeln' that my buddy's gonna need me =
at the Ark.  Depthcharge, honor ta see ya again, but, I gotta split.  It's =
gonna take me a while ta get back ta the Ark'n my buddy down there needs me=
.  Salute Lord Perseus for me. You guys, you stay here'n help out Lord Pers=
eus.  And I promise little guy, Wheels is gonna be okay."

Rat Trap smiles.=


"Thanks Tall Dark'n deceptive.  No pun intended."

Night Shift gives a sl=
ight chuckle.

"No offense taken.  I'll see you guys around."

He salutes a=
nd transforms into SUV mode, making a B line for the out doors and toward t=
he Ark.  To avoid scandal amongst the Decepticons, he's careful to switch h=
is faction symbol and his signature to that of a Decepticon car, to make it=
 appear that he's one of them.

"This should throw those bozos off for a wh=
ile.."
